segments.text: The girl is so cute, standing there with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s waiting patiently for her brother to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how excited she looks, like it’s the best moment ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t seem worried about the stool or the water at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her face is full of hope, and it’s adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she knows how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so focused on the cookies, nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she gets one before they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her innocence makes this scene even more charming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile watching her.
segments.speaker: PAR
